item.title: 美国公布 7 月消费者支出稳健；核心通胀走强
item.description: 7 月份，美国消费者支出稳健增长，同时，由于进口关税提高了部分商品的价格，基本通胀率有所回升，但在劳动力市场状况疲软的背景下，这些数据可能无法阻止美联储下月降息。【原文：U.S. consumer spending increased solidly in July while underlying inflation picked up as tariffs on imports raised prices of some goods, but that data will probably not prevent the Federal Reserve from cutting interest rates next month against the backdrop of softening labor market conditions.】

item.title: 对美联储独立性的担忧导致全球股票基金流入减少
item.description: 在截至8月27日的一周内，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）试图解雇一名美联储理事，人们对美联储的独立性感到担忧，全球股票基金的需求出现下滑。【原文：Global equity funds witnessed a dip in demand in the week through August 27 on concerns around the Federal Reserve's independence as President Donald Trump attempted to fire a Federal Reserve governor.】

item.title: 埃及围捕青少年 TikTokkers，打击社交媒体
item.description: 埃及当局一直在围捕拥有数百万粉丝的青少年 TikTokkers，最近几周拘留了数十人，指控罪名从违反家庭价值观到洗钱不等。【原文：Egyptian authorities have been rounding up teenaged TikTokkers with millions of followers, detaining dozens in recent weeks on accusations ranging from violating family values to laundering money.】

item.title: 西班牙政府因使用华为设备取消与西班牙电信的合同
item.description: 西班牙数字转型部表示，西班牙政府已经取消了与西班牙电信公司（Telefonica）签订的光纤服务合同，原因是该公司使用了中国华为公司生产的设备，因为欧洲担心此类设备可能会带来安全风险。【原文：The Spanish government has cancelled a fiber-optic service contract with Telefonica over the use of equipment made by China's Huawei amid concerns in Europe that such gear may pose a security risk, the Digital Transformation Ministry said.】

item.title: 由于价格战的影响，比亚迪的季度利润在三年半以来首次下降
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪的季度利润出现了三年多来的首次下滑，因为在政府打击价格战的运动中，比亚迪的扩张遇到了障碍。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD's quarterly profit fell for the first time in more than three years, as its expansion hit a speed bump amid a government campaign against price wars.】

item.title: 独家报道新管道停滞不前，中国寻求通过旧管道获得更多俄罗斯天然气
item.description: 两位行业消息人士告诉路透社，中国正寻求通过现有的一条管道购买更多俄罗斯天然气，因为两国就建设第二条管道的谈判未能取得进展，这阻碍了莫斯科寻求新的出路。【原文：China is seeking to buy more Russian gas through an existing pipeline as talks between the two countries have failed to make progress on building a second link, thwarting Moscow's quest for new outlets, two industry sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 杜邦将以 18 亿美元向 Arclin 出售芳纶业务
item.description: 化学品制造商杜邦公司周五表示，将以 18 亿美元的价格把芳纶业务出售给同行 Arclin 公司。【原文：Chemical maker DuPont said on Friday it will sell its Aramids business to peer Arclin for $1.8 billion.】

item.title: 百事公司以 5.85 亿美元增持能量饮料制造商 Celsius 的股份
item.description: 百事公司和 Celsius 控股公司周五表示，百事公司已通过一项价值 5.85 亿美元的交易增持了能量饮料生产商 Celsius 控股公司的股份。【原文：PepsiCo has increased its stake in energy drink maker Celsius Holdings through a $585 million deal, the companies said on Friday.】

item.title: 供应过剩忧虑升温，石油面临艰苦奋斗：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，今年油价不太可能从目前的水平上获得太大的牵引力，因为主要产油国产量的上升增加了过剩的风险，而美国的关税威胁又抑制了需求的增长。【原文：Oil prices are unlikely to gain much traction from current levels this year as rising output from top producers adds to the risk of a surplus and U.S. tariff threats curb demand growth, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒上调年度关税成本预期后下跌
item.description: 卡特彼勒（Caterpillar）股价在周五的盘前交易中下跌多达 3%，一天前这家重型设备制造商预测 2025 年与关税相关的支出将增加，因为各公司都在争相评估美国贸易政策变化的影响。【原文：Caterpillar's shares lost as much as 3% in premarket trading on Friday, a day after the heavy-equipment maker forecast higher tariff-related expenses for 2025, as companies scramble to assess the impact of shifting U.S. trade policy.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，百事公司将增持能量饮料制造商 Celsius 的股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，百事公司将通过一项价值 5.85 亿美元的交易增持 Celsius Holdings 的股份。【原文：PepsiCo is increasing its stake in Celsius Holdings through a $585 million deal, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普发出关税威胁，印度经济仍意外回暖
item.description: 由于美国大幅提高关税有可能在未来几个季度拖累商业活动，印度经济在4-6月份出人意料地增强了实力，打破了增长放缓的预期。【原文：India's economy unexpectedly gathered strength in the April-June quarter, defying expectations of slower growth as steep U.S. tariff hikes threaten to weigh on business activity in coming quarters.】

item.title: 美国 最新通胀形势考验美联储鸽派政策
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 挪威寻求化解与特朗普盟友在基金退出卡特彼勒问题上的冲突
item.description: 挪威首相周五表示，他已与美国参议员林赛-格雷厄姆（Lindsey Graham）取得联系，试图化解挪威主权基金以道德为由决定出售其在建筑设备集团卡特彼勒（Caterpillar）所有股份的争议。【原文：Norway's prime minister said on Friday he had contacted U.S. Senator Lindsey Graham to try to defuse a controversy over a decision by the Norwegian sovereign fund to sell all its shares in construction equipment group Caterpillar on ethics grounds.】

item.title: 华尔街期货在关键通胀数据公布前下滑
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货下跌，因为在一份可能影响美联储 9 月利率决定的、备受瞩目的通胀报告公布之前，谨慎情绪占据了主导地位。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Friday as caution dominated the mood ahead of a highly anticipated inflation report that could influence the Federal Reserve's September interest-rate decision.】

item.title: 蚂蚁金服集团季度利润下降 60% 至 6.63 亿美元
item.description: 据路透社根据股东阿里巴巴周五公布的财报计算，截至 3 月 31 日的三个月内，中国金融科技公司蚂蚁金服集团净利润下滑 60.5%，至 47.4 亿元人民币（合 6.627 亿美元）。【原文：Chinese fintech company Ant Group posted a 60.5% slide in net profit to 4.74 billion yuan ($662.7 million) in the three months to March 31, according to Reuters calculations based on earnings reported by stakeholder Alibaba on Friday.】

item.title: 中国房地产开发商 Seazen 表示将探索真实世界资产代币化
item.description: 中国房地产开发商海泉集团（Seazen Group）周五表示，该集团正在香港成立一家机构，以推进真实资产（RWA）代币化，这一过程将资产转化为可在区块链上交易的数字代币。【原文：Chinese property developer Seazen Group is setting up an institute in Hong Kong to push forward real-world asset (RWA) tokenization, it said on Friday, a process that converts assets into digital tokens that can be traded on a blockchain.】

item.title: 戴尔业绩下滑，因利润率疲软使全年业绩预期大打折扣
item.description: 戴尔科技公司股价在周五的盘前交易中下跌了近 6%，原因是低迷的季度利润预测和弱于预期的第二季度利润率给乐观的全年预期蒙上了阴影。【原文：Shares of Dell Technologies dropped nearly 6% in premarket trading on Friday, as a dour quarterly profit forecast and weaker-than-expected second-quarter margin rate overshadowed upbeat full-year estimates.】

item.title: 特朗普解雇美联储理事库克可能被美国法官阻止
item.description: 一名联邦法官周五将考虑是否暂时阻止唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克，同时库克将提起诉讼，声称特朗普没有正当理由解除她的职务。【原文：A federal judge on Friday will consider whether to block President Donald Trump temporarily from firing Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook while she pursues a lawsuit claiming Trump has no valid reason to remove her.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 美国就业数据对降息希望构成考验，股市反弹
item.description: 下周晚些时候的一份美国劳动力市场报告将对经济健康状况做出重要解读，并考验投资者对降息即将到来的信心，这种观点已帮助美国股市升至历史最高水平。【原文：A U.S. labor market report late next week will give a crucial read into the economy's health and test investors' confidence that interest rate cuts are coming soon, a view that has helped lift U.S. equities to record-high levels.】

item.title: 意大利总统梅洛尼对针对女性的网站表示 "反感"，网上辱骂事件引起强烈反响
item.description: 意大利乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）周五对一家成人网站未经授权发布包括总理在内的女性照片表示愤慨，网络上的厌女症和虐待行为在全国引起强烈反响。【原文：Italy's Giorgia Meloni expressed outrage on Friday over an adult website that published unauthorised pictures of women, including of the prime minister, amid a national outcry over online misogyny and abuse.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴第一季度营收低于预期
item.description: 中国阿里巴巴公司周五公布的季度营收不及市场预期，原因是该公司的电子商务业务正努力应对激烈的竞争和不稳定的消费需求，这使其云计算业务的收益黯然失色。【原文：China's Alibaba , missed market estimates for quarterly revenue on Friday as the company's e-commerce business grapples with tough competition and choppy consumer demand, eclipsing gains in its cloud computing business.】

item.title: 人工智能增强型沉浸式《绿野仙踪》首次亮相拉斯维加斯
item.description: 周四，在拉斯维加斯举行的身临其境版好莱坞经典影片《绿野仙踪》首映式上，旋转的风、无人机操作的猴子和人工智能为《绿野仙踪》带来了新的生命力。【原文：Swirling winds, drone-operated monkeys and artificial intelligence brought new life to "The Wizard of Oz" on Thursday at the premiere of an immersive version of the Hollywood classic in Las Vegas.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：中国阿里巴巴开发新型人工智能芯片，帮助填补英伟达空白
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，中国阿里巴巴公司开发出了一款新芯片，它比老款芯片功能更多，旨在服务于更广泛的人工智能推理任务。【原文：China's Alibaba , has developed a new chip that is more versatile than its older chips and is meant to serve a broader range of AI inference tasks, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华为上半年利润下降 32%，研发支出巨大
item.description: 中国科技巨头华为公司（HWT.UL）周五公布上半年净利润下降了32%，原因是该公司为抵制美国制裁而在研发上花费巨资。【原文：Chinese tech giant Huawei (HWT.UL) reported a 32% drop in first-half net profit on Friday as it spent heavily on research and development to defy U.S. sanctions.】

item.title: Reliance Jio 将于 2026 年上半年申请 IPO
item.description: 母公司信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）董事长、亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）周五告诉股东们，电信和数字巨头信实 Jio Platforms 将于 2026 年上半年申请首次公开募股。【原文：Telecom and digital giant Reliance Jio Platforms will file for an initial public offering in the first half of 2026, billionaire Mukesh Ambani, chairman of parent firm Reliance Industries , told shareholders on Friday.】

item.title: 律师称台积电将推出商业机密管理系统
item.description: 台湾的台积公司生产世界上最先进的芯片。现在，它希望教会其供应商和合作伙伴如何更好地管理商业机密，以促进创新。【原文：Taiwan's TSMC manufactures the world's most advanced chips. It now wants to teach its suppliers and partners how to better manage their trade secrets to foster innovation.】

item.title: 首尔：受与俄罗斯关系推动，朝鲜 2024 年实现 8 年来最快增长
item.description: 据韩国央行周五公布的估计，2024 年朝鲜经济将增长 3.7%，为八年来最快的年增长率，这主要得益于与俄罗斯经济关系的扩大。【原文：North Korea's economy grew 3.7% in 2024, the fastest annual pace of growth in eight years, backed by expanded economic ties with Russia, according to estimates by South Korea's central bank released on Friday.】

item.title: 数据中心前景黯淡加剧人工智能芯片担忧，Marvell公司股价下挫
item.description: 周五盘前交易中，Marvell Technology 的股价暴跌 11.3%，原因是该芯片制造商的数据中心需求前景未达预期，而此前投资者大举押注为微软和亚马逊等云计算巨头提供人工智能工作负载的定制芯片。【原文：Shares of Marvell Technology slumped 11.3% in premarket trading on Friday as the chipmaker's data center demand outlook fell short of lofty expectations after investors bet big on custom chips that power AI workloads for cloud giants such as Microsoft and Amazon .】

item.title: 德国机械设备制造业联合会称欧盟对美国商品的豁免计划是 "一记耳光
item.description: 德国机械设备制造业联合会（VDMA）机械设备制造商游说团周五称，欧盟计划对来自美国的某些产品实行关税豁免是 "直接打脸"，并称欧盟委员会需要 "紧急重新谈判"。【原文：Germany's VDMA machinery and equipment manufacturers lobby on Friday called the EU's planned tariff exemption for certain products from the United States "a direct slap in the face" and said the EU Commission needed to "urgently renegotiate".】
